original_title: China, Afghanistan, Pakistan pledge greater cooperation for shared development
article_summary: China, Afghanistan, and Pakistan reaffirmed their commitment to enhancing cooperation for regional peace, stability, and shared prosperity at the sixth China-Afghanistan-Pakistan Trilateral Foreign Ministers' Dialogue. The three nations discussed expanding development cooperation, boosting trade and investment, improving connectivity infrastructure, and strengthening people-to-people ties, as well as deeper security collaboration to combat transnational terrorism.</s>
